fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Trade, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation, Public Health, Food Safety, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: The Changing Markets Foundation campaigns on a range of topics including climate change, environmental protection and pollution prevention, food and health, and resource efficiency and circular economy.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership:
Changing Markets is a member of Eating Better 
 
http://www.eating-better.org
relevant_communication: The Changing Markets Foundation conducts research, including market and supply-chain investigations, to help advance the campaigns that we support. To see examples of our work, please visit http://changingmarkets.org/campaigns/
legal_status: Not for profit organisation. ANBI status (NL).
goals__remit: The Changing Markets Foundation partners with NGOs on market focused campaigns. Our mission is to expose irresponsible corporate practices and drive change towards a more sustainable economy. Our approach is based on two key ideas 1) sustainability is an urgent challenge to which most solutions already exist; 2) market forces can be leveraged to drive rapid and self-reinforcing change towards a more sustainable economy. Changing Markets was formed to accelerate this transition.
